market: AI remains a structural growth cycle, but 2026 equity leadership should rotate toward firms that convert adoption into visible cash-flow quality, not just capex scale or benchmark headlines.
tech: Monetization is shifting from raw model novelty to workflow-embedded AI with strong inference efficiency, governance controls, and distribution moats across enterprise surfaces.
risk: Top downside is capex outrunning monetization, amplified by export-control shifts, power/grid bottlenecks, and faster model-layer commoditization that pressures pricing.
